thoughts.text: The 'browse_website' command returned an error, which suggests that the website may have changed or may not be accessible. I will use the 'google' command to search for information about the Brno Reservoir Loop trail instead.
thoughts.reasoning: If I am unable to access the website for the hiking trail, then I will need to find another way to gather information about the trail. Using the 'google' command to search for information about the trail will allow me to quickly find relevant information.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'google' command to search for information about the Brno Reservoir Loop trail
- Look for information about the length of the trail, the difficulty level, and any notable landmarks or features along the way
- Take notes on important information to remember
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that I am using reliable sources when gathering information about the trail, as some sources may not be accurate or up-to-date.
